Task: Named Entity Recognition for Medical Texts
Description: The task involves identifying named entities in segmented medical text parts, classifying tokens into specific categories such as PREFIX, SYMPTOM, DIAGNOSIS, STRUCTURE, ROMAN_NUMERAL, and NOTE.

Entity_Classes.B-PREFIX: Indicates the beginning of a prefix or title in the text.
Entity_Classes.I-PREFIX: Indicates a continuation of a prefix or title.
Entity_Classes.B-SYMPTOM: Indicates the beginning of a symptom entity in the text.
Entity_Classes.I-SYMPTOM: Indicates a continuation of a symptom entity.
Entity_Classes.B-DIAGNOSIS: Indicates the beginning of a diagnosis entity in the text.
Entity_Classes.I-DIAGNOSIS: Indicates a continuation of a diagnosis entity.
Entity_Classes.B-STRUCTURE: Indicates the beginning of a structural entity such as a measurement or object.
Entity_Classes.I-STRUCTURE: Indicates a continuation of a structural entity.
Entity_Classes.B-ROMAN_NUMERAL: Indicates the beginning of a Roman numeral in the text.
Entity_Classes.B-NOTE: Indicates the beginning of a note or recommendation.
Entity_Classes.I-NOTE: Indicates a continuation of a note or recommendation.

text_parts.description: Segmented parts of the input text, each word or token represented as a separate string.

named_entity_recognition_target.description: Corresponding tags for each token, representing the NER classification.
